quote: Pecan Shaker 2024 wasn't without tragedy, as we did have quite the rain before raceday, making for soggy conditions on certain areas of the course.
Remember folks, we are here to have some fun and ride bikes, but your safety while on course is always our #1 priority!

All of us here at Cycling Quests and the Gravel want to give a huge shoutout to the town of Hawkinsville for being such great hosts each year, as well as all of our generous partners for supplying raffle prizes for all our events!
